    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Mature Trained Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1203) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God](/Sources.aspx?ID=23) pg. 76</row>

**Archetype** [Animal Trainer
](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=38)

**Prerequisites**
[Animal Trainer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1201)

</column>

---

Your animal companion grows up, becoming a [mature animal companion](/Rules.aspx?ID=155). Increase its proficiency rank in [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) to expert instead of one of the three skill increases for mature. It gains the Mesmerizing Performance advanced maneuver, rather than the normal advanced maneuver for its type. 

<document level="2" id="action-380" />

<title level="2">Mature Trained Companion leads to...</title>
[Splendid Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1208)
name: Mature Trained Companion
